block.p: The text with a chart last Sunday in Stocks in the News carried incorrect information about the reason for the rise in Igen International's shares the previous week.

Igen International NNM: IGEN Roche agreed to aquire Igen International for $1.26 billion, then give nearly the whole company back to Igen's shareholders in exchange for a license to use Igen's amino acid-based technology without paying royalties. Igen will also receive a working-capital payment from Roche, raising the value of the deal to about $1.4 billion. CLOSE (JULY 25): $59.25 WEEKS CHANGE: +74.83% EST. '03 P/E: --
